nodes.text: Braco was an individual who was a subscriber to, and commenter on, Cynabar's Droid Datalog. Braco related a story on the entry for the WED15-D3 about how a crime lord, possibly Moruth Doole, tried to use the droids to process glitterstim. The droids ended up shredding and tearing the glitterstim, causing the loss of millions of credits. Braco's uncle, a member of CorSec, was highly amused when he heard the story.
